body:
No...I can't take this
It's probably the ending
I'm just "looking" (I'm not paying attention anymore) to see how it ends but is not worth reading after chapter 7

Why the fuck did he go to this i still don't get it the story was great until chapter 7, and there doesn't seem to be any change he's not even make the main boy follow him to see why he acting like this or even making hit tell him what's happen what kinda bull shit us this and he only continuing because there people loving this route because if there wasn't any he would have changed back when the sails dropped
Wow good hahaha beautiful ❤️ ❤️ ❤️ ❤️ ❤️
I support artists bu this is just bullshit
Way to ruin a story mate
This shit is too depressing to get a boner.

What is the author trying to accomplish with this? Will this even have a good ending? It was so vanilla at the start, sure I can accept some dark twists here and there but this is too much, this been going since chapter 7 and seems like it will not change anytime soon... At this point the characters and the story are ruined but im still curious to see how will this end and I hope it's not a bad ending.
I want to see him fisting, turning into a little girl and having his crushed chopstick S2
@Makotoshinin This is compilation of chapters 1-6. 335325
i don't understand why he went to prostitute himself, can someone explain to me why it ended up like this?
where tf are 4-5-6 Chapter?

I just went to straight to the  comment section because I really don’t want so see this- I was hoping for it to get better but it just got worse - chapter 7 is where it all went to shit.   damn  it was very cute and sweet   Coming of age doujin with the boys but now it’s just rape and ugly fat old men
The author really decided to fuck up this up by adding ugly bastards, tf happened to good ol' vanilla childhood romance?
why...I…but why …

As i see it... 
It went up hill from here
i like ntr but bruh, not like this
This story is FUCKING AWFUL NOW. Why did the author go from childhood romance to rape trafficking. THIS IS BULLSHIT!!!🤬🤢🤮😡
Ntrrr omg i felt this HAHAHAA
Not a fan of yaoi but WTF? The story passed from being vanilla to random NTR/gangbang rape in less than three chapters with a complete tonal shift. What's even the point?
Jesus fucking chist why did the author decided to go this route. He could just create new characters this is so extremely out of place.
